title: In the last 10 years, Paris has closed 100 streets to cars,...
content:
In the last 10 years, Paris has closed 100 streets to cars, removed 50,000 parking spots, tripled parking fees for SUVs, and built more than 800 miles of bike lanes. â€œThose changes have contributed to a 40% decline in air pollution.â€
